name: 吳斯偉
objective: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務策略與創新模式，其主題包含各式服務個案以及創新與創業的商業計畫、營利模式、策略分析、行為經濟分析等議題。This course focuses on allowing students to understand service strategies and innovation models. Its topics include various service cases, business plans for innovation and entrepreneurship, profit models, strategic analysis, behavioral economic analysis and other topics.
